TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit WindowInteropHelper extends System.Object

summary.span: 协助在 Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) 和 Win32 代码之间进行互操作。

span.span: Assists interoperation between Windows Presentation Foundation (WPF) and Win32 code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类的成员允许调用方对 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] HWND 和父 HWND 进行内部访问。Members of this class allows the caller to have internal access to the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] HWND and the parent HWND of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] . 适当的安全检查由这些成员执行。The proper security checks are performed by those members. 每当需要基于其 HWND 的更具体对象时，请使用此类。Use this class whenever you need a more specific object based on its HWND. 例如，如果需要在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] 应用程序中承载 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 对话框。An example scenario is if you need to host a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] dialog box in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] application. 使用对话框的 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 窗口对象初始化 。Initialize the with a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window object for the dialog box. 然后，您可以从 "" 属性获取 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 窗口的句柄（HWND），并通过 属性指定 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 窗口的所有者。You can then get the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window's handle (HWND) from the property and specify the owner for the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] window with the property. 下面的代码示例演示如何在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] 应用程序中承载 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 对话框时使用 。The following code example shows how to use when hosting a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] dialog box in a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] application. [!code-csharp[CorePseudocode#WindowInteropHelper](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/CSharp/corepseudocode.cs#windowinterophelper)] [!code-vb[CorePseudocode#WindowInteropHelper](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CorePseudocode/visualbasic/corepseudocode.vb#windowinterophelper)] 此类支持的另一种方案是从 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] 对象获取 对象。Another scenario supported by this class is to obtain a object from a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] object. 允许通过 方法直接处理 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] 消息。The enables direct processing of [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] messages through the method. 通过使用 和 来替代 ，你仍可以在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]中处理无等效项或处理的消息。By using and in place of a you can still handle messages that have no equivalent or handling in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. 使用 源创建 ，然后在 上调用 ，以从 HWND 到 获取。Create a with the source, then call on the to get from HWND to .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Window window) cil managed

summary.span: 为指定的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 窗口初始化 类的一个新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class for a specified [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 窗口可以是对话框，也可以是不适合在 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] 应用程序的边界内承载的窗口。The window can be a dialog box, or a window that is otherwise not suitable for being hosted within the bounds of a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] application.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance native int EnsureHandle() cil managed

summary.span: 如果尚未创建窗口的 HWND，则创建 HWND。

span.span: Creates the HWND of the window if the HWND has not been created yet.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果要从托管 的实际显示中分离窗口句柄（HWND）创建，请使用 方法。Use the method when you want to separate window handle (HWND) creation from the actual showing of the managed . 如果你的自动化客户端无需显示窗口即可完成其任务，则这非常有用。This is useful when you have an automation client that can accomplish its tasks without the need for showing a window. 如果尚未创建本机窗口，此方法将创建本机窗口，设置 属性，然后返回 HWND。If the native window has not yet been created, this method creates the native window, sets the property, and returns the HWND. 如果已创建本机窗口，则返回现有本机窗口的句柄。If the native window has been created already, the handle of the existing native window is returned. 如果通过调用此方法来创建本机窗口，则会引发 事件。If the native window is created as a result of calling this method, the event is raised. 调用 方法后，查询 属性返回现有的窗口句柄。Querying the property after the method is called returns the existing window handle. 在调用 方法之前，不会将可视化树附加到窗口中。The visual tree is not attached to the window until after the method is called. 多次调用 方法不会创建新的窗口句柄。Calling the method more than one time does not create new window handles. 如果已通过调用 方法创建了句柄，则调用 方法不会创建新的窗口句柄。Calling the method when the handle has already been created by a call to the method does not create a new window handle. 仅当调用 方法时，才会创建本机窗口。A native window is only created when no handle exists when the method is called. 通过使用本机窗口 Api 通过 p/invoke 设置的窗口属性可能不会出现在托管窗口 Api 中。Window properties that are set by using native window APIs via p/invoke may not appear in the managed window APIs. 例如，如果在调用 方法后使用本机 MS_EX_TOPMOST 标志将窗口设置为最顶层，则不保证 属性反映本机设置。For example, if you set the window to be topmost by using the native MS_EX_TOPMOST flag after the method is called, the property is not guaranteed to reflect the native setting.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Handle As IntPtr
public: property IntPtr Handle { IntPtr get(); };

summary.span: 获取用于创建此 的 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 窗口的窗口句柄。

span.span: Gets the window handle for a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] window that is used to create this .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property IntPtr Owner { IntPtr get(); void set(IntPtr value); };
member this.Owner : nativeint with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] 所有者窗口的句柄。

span.span: Gets or sets the handle of the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] owner window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以通过设置此属性来重设窗口的父级。You can reparent windows by setting this property. 与常规 [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] 编程一样，请不要对已在使用中的 windows 进行重设父级。As is true for general [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_win32](~/includes/tla2sharptla-win32-md.md)] programming, do not reparent windows that are already in use.
